original: Allring, Eric, disponent, Vetlanda, f. 11/4/98 i Byarum, Jönköp. 1. G. 24 m. Signe Fritz. Barn: Synnöve f. 24, Ulla 27, Monica 37. — Stud. v. Jönköp. handedissk. Resa t. Finl. 40. Anst. v. A-B Fogelfors Bruk 35-42, disp. f. A-B Åsedahus i Aseda o. A-B Allrings Snickerier i Vetlanda sed. 42. Inneh. ett flert. patent, huvrsakl. inom byggn .-branschen. Hobbies : jakt, fiske.
translated: Allring, Eric, manager, Vetlanda, born April 11, 1898 in Byarum, Jönköping. First marriage to Signe Fritz, with children: Synnöve born in 1924, Ulla born in 1927, and Monica born in 1937. Attended Jönköping Handicraft School. Traveled to Finland in 1940. Employed at Fogelfors Bruk AB from 1935-1942. Manager for Åsedahus AB and Allring's Carpentry in Vetlanda since 1942, owning several patents mainly related to construction industry. Hobbies include hunting and fishing.

patent.name: Several patents related to construction industry
